TopicTitle: [WIP] Model Rockets - Tiny Rocket Parts: Fun for the Whole Family!

Articles.Content:
Ever wanted model rockets?

Model rockets plans to add many new parts to KSP that act as model rockets. Many manufacturers will make many parts.

Plans:

  • Tiny SRBs
  • Tiny LFO tanks and engines
  • Tiny structural fuselages
  • Tiny parachutes (I'm new to modding, this feature might take a while.)
  • Many variations by different companies!

Ill get to work on August 10th. A beta release date is not confirmed.
Actually, the only manufactures that ought to be involved are Kerlington Model Rockets and Paper Products and Periapsis Co.
I think the biggest question is ... are there gonna be mini kerbals to go in them
Also, if you have a liquid fueled engine, you're NOT making a model rocket. You're making a rocket.

Also, if you have a liquid fueled engine, you're NOT making a model rocket. You're making a rocket.

Not necessarily. I have a model rocket that runs on jet fuel.
if I might make a suggestion: Tiny probe core. I'd like to be able to control my rocket.

Rather than limiting your focus (and potential manufacturers / agencies) to model rockets, consider revising your vision to that of Sounding Rockets - small-diameter rockets with real scientific applications (e.g. upper atmospheric research).
